narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection. 
From the previous inspection report dated February 23, 2016, the Norwich terrier (m/c# 985112004785429) had had
its toenails trimmed.  The English Bulldog named Bubba (m/c# 9560000089921466), the Wiemeraner named Myra
(m/c# OAOK123076), the Weimeraner named Mathilda (m/c# 985112006454440), and the Shiba Inu (m/c#
941000017801694) had been examined by a veterinarian, had been provided appropriate treatment, and their
conditions had improved.  The adult Weimeraners had bedding.  A concrete drainage system had been built in front
of the pens in the sheltered building.
 
The inspection and the exit briefing were conducted with a facility representative.
